title: Man accidentally shot himself in leg in parking lot, police say
content:
No threat to the public, according to dispatchers
ANDERSON COUNTY, S.C. —
A man shot himself in the leg Wednesday night in an Anderson County parking lot, according to Lt. Tony Tilley with the Anderson police.
Police and EMS responded to the accidental gunshot wound just after 7 p.m. in the shared parking lot between KFC and Walmart on Highway 28 bypass.
Tilley said the victim accidentally shot himself in the leg and called 911.
The man was taken to Anderson Medical Center for non life threatening injuries, Tilley said.
